name: Email Composer
description: Draft, reply to, and manage emails with AI. Supports Outlook and Gmail integration.

name: Document Writer
description: Generate reports, proposals, and documentation in Markdown or PDF format.

name: Web Crawler
description: Crawl websites, extract structured data, and build knowledge bases automatically.

name: Task Scheduler
description: Schedule recurring tasks, background jobs, and automated workflows.

name: Code Reviewer
description: Analyze code quality, find bugs, and suggest improvements across multiple languages.

name: Data Analyst
description: Process CSV/Excel files, generate charts, and create data-driven insights.

name: Telegram Bot
description: Control your agent remotely via Telegram. Send commands, receive reports.

name: Memory Manager
description: Persistent memory across conversations. The agent remembers context and preferences.

name: LinkedIn Publisher
description: Generate and publish professional LinkedIn articles and posts with AI.

name: PDF Generator
description: Create beautifully formatted PDF reports with charts, tables, and branding.

name: API Integrator
description: Connect to any REST API. Build custom integrations with authentication handling.

name: Multi-Agent Orchestrator
description: Run multiple AI agents in parallel. Coordinate complex workflows across providers.

name: Outlook Digest
description: Daily email digest with AI summaries of your inbox. Priority sorting included.

name: Grant Writer
description: AI-assisted grant and proposal writing with EU funding framework knowledge.

name: Custom Skill Builder
description: Create your own skills with a visual editor. Define prompts, tools, and workflows.

name: Team Workspace
description: Shared agent workspace for teams. Collaborate on skills, share memory pools.
